member.name: M:VirtoCommerce.PricingModule.Data.Search.ProductPriceDocumentChangesProvider.GetProductIdsForChangedPricesAsync(System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves all price changes and groups them by the product Id they are associated with.
member.param: Take count for the search criteria
Skip count for the search criteria
member.returns: The unique list of products identifiers associated with changed prices for passed period

member.name: T:VirtoCommerce.PricingModule.Data.Services.DefaultPricingPriorityFilterPolicy
